instruction: Evaluate the given script and tell me whether the script is good or bad.
input: The story follows a group of five college friends looking to escape their mundane reality by road-tripping down to an exotic beach.
output: Good. The script provides an interesting premise with a story that will draw readers in and keep them hooked until the end. The characters and storylines have depth, creating a compelling narrative that readers can relate to and enjoy. While it may seem cliché, the idea of a road trip allows for the audience to experience exciting adventures that add a level of excitement to the story. With a well-structured plot, the script is sure to be a hit.
